name: SleepNoiseBoat
0:
”Alexa, open sleep noise boat”
”Alexa, start sleep noise boat”
”Alexa, launch sleep noise boat”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise boat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Boat lets you reproduce relaxing ocean audio tracks that will make you feel like you're in aboat in the middle of the ocean. A mind-relaxing skill. Listen to this skill if you want to calm or concentrate.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
